Text: "A Rather Blustery Day" is a whimsical song from the Walt Disney musical film featurette, "Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day".

Text: A Rather Blustery Day:  It was written by Robert & Richard Sherman and sung by Jim Cummings as "Pooh".
